sentence: observations and open issues from recent experiences against this backdrop, i want to raise four issues important to the conduct of monetary policy for your consideration and study.

sentence: the first two issues involve the supply side of the economy and grow out of the unusual conjuncture in recent years of rapid growth and high resource utilization with low, if not declining, inflation.
